content: please see the pattern for details about how to make this item to any size desired and with any yarn desired please note that there is no video tutorial for this pattern it is a written pattern only there are photos included for each step and also a chart within the pattern there are many tutorials available online for the stitches used in this pattern the only difference is making decreasing stitches front post stitches rather than just going into the top of the stitch as you normally do
